mapper.insert: insert into tb_attendance( ATT_NO, EMP_NO, ATT_DATE, ATT_CLOCK_IN, ATT_CLOCK_OUT, IP_CLOCK_IN, IP_CLOCK_OUT, ATT_status ) values( (select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')||'01'||#{emp_no} from dual) , #{emp_no}, sysdate , sysdate, null , #{ip_clock_in}, null , 'N' )
mapper.update: update tb_attendance set ATT_CLOCK_OUT = sysdate, IP_CLOCK_OUT = #{ip_clock_out} where att_no in (select att_no from tb_attendance where emp_no = #{emp_no} ) and ATT_CLOCK_IN = (select max(ATT_CLOCK_IN) from (select * from tb_attendance where emp_no = #{emp_no}) )
mapper.insert: insert into tb_attendance_approval( ATT_APPR_NO , ATT_NO , EMP_NO , ATT_APPR_CONTENT, ATT_APPR_result , ATT_APPR_CLOCK_IN, ATT_APPR_CLOCK_OUT , att_appr_date, att_appr_req_date ) values ( (select nvl(max(ATT_APPR_NO),0)+1 from tb_attendance_approval) , (select att_no from tb_attendance where to_char(ATT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{att_appr_req_date} and emp_no = #{emp_no}) , null , #{att_appr_content}, '3' , #{att_appr_clock_in}, #{att_appr_clock_out} , null, sysdate )
